translations: 运动，运转；动作（movement 的复数形式）；运动健身

sentences.sentence: Tennis requires a lot of short sharp movements.
sentences.translation: 网球运动需要大量快速而剧烈的动作。

sentences.sentence: His movements were so graceful they seemed effortless.
sentences.translation: 他的动作如此优雅，看似非常从容自如。

sentences.sentence: These movements will exercise your arms and shoulders.
sentences.translation: 这些动作将锻炼你的手臂和肩膀。
